description:
Discover the amazing benefits of connecting with your Spirit Guides and how to open yourself to the signs from the Divine.

Everyone has Spirit Guides. In fact, everyone has a Spirit team made up of Guides, Guardian Angels and Archangels, that are all here to help your soul on its journey.

When you connect to your Divine Spirit team, there is a constant feeling of comfort, reassurance and connectivity that will drastically alter the way in which you live your life.

In this course, we will explore how to connect with your Spirit Guides and how to invite your angelic team into your life.

There are 5 lessons and each comes with written material, videos, recommending readings/resources and practical exercises you can do at home.

Here is a brief breakdown of what you will learn in each lesson:

Lesson One:

  • Learn What A Spirit Guide Is
  • Learn How your Spirit Team Can Help You

Lesson Two:

  • Learn connection tools including-
    • raising your vibration
    • opening your third eye chakra
Lesson Three:
  • Strengthen Your Intuition
  • Learn the Difference between Intuition and Spirit Guides
  • Learn How to Connect with Your Spirit Guides
Lesson Four:
  • Learn ways in which Spirit Guides communicate
  • Get to Know Your Spirit Guides:
    • Learn their name
    • How Many you Have
    • Learn to know when they are around and how they communicate specifically
  • Learn How to Ask for Guidance
Lesson Five:
  • Learn ways to stay open to your Spirit Guides
  • Discover the importance of Gratitude in connection
  • Tools to help you Maintain the Connection in every day life
Each lesson should take around 7 days to complete but the course can be done entirely at your own pace. This course is designed for beginners and for those who wish to establish a greater connection with their guides. No pre-requisites are required and the only materials you need to complete this course are:
  • An Open Mind
  • A Computer and Internet Connection
  • A journal (optional)
This course also offers full access to Email support- this means at any time you can email and ask questions, for guidance and for support with anything through the course. At the end of the course you should be able to:
  1. Invite Spirit Guides and Angels into your Life
  2. Know who your Spirit Guides Are (how many, names etc)
  3. Understand How Your Spirit Guides Communicate and how you can Ask them for Guidance
  4. Know the difference between connecting with your Guides, your Intuition and when it's your ego.
  5. Feel the Connection to the Divine and to your Spirit Team
  6. Receive guidance from your Spirit Guides about any questions or issues in your life
For more information please contact info@foreverconscious.com

Course artwork by Marina Petro
title: How to Connect With Your Spirit Guides
